languages.text: "Вы... тоже видите это?" {n}Кассия смущенно отстраняется, и малиновый стыд оседает ей на плечи газовой шалью. А затем растворяется, и отголоски чужой силы отпускают вас. Боль и страх ушли незаметно, и вам почему-то кажется, что следующий раз уже не будет столь невыносимым. Что будет... следующий раз.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Вы... тоже видите это?" {n}Кассия смущенно отстраняется, и малиновый стыд оседает ей на плечи газовой шалью. А затем растворяется, и отголоски чужой силы отпускают вас. Боль и страх ушли незаметно, и вам почему-то кажется, что следующий раз уже не будет столь невыносимым. Что будет... следующий раз.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. And that there definitely will be a next time.{/n}

languages.text: “你也……看到了吗？”{n}卡西娅窘迫地从你身边逃开，殷红的困窘如同纱巾般披落她的双肩。随着那抹红色逐渐消退，你也从这种古怪的力量漩涡中解脱出来。你不知道疼痛与恐惧是何时消失的，但不知为何，你总感觉这绝不会是你最后一次体验这种感受，而且下次一定不会如此痛苦。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. And that there definitely will be a next time.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “你也……看到了吗？”{n}卡西娅窘迫地从你身边逃开，殷红的困窘如同纱巾般披落她的双肩。随着那抹红色逐渐消退，你也从这种古怪的力量漩涡中解脱出来。你不知道疼痛与恐惧是何时消失的，但不知为何，你总感觉这绝不会是你最后一次体验这种感受，而且下次一定不会如此痛苦。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Seht Ihr ... das auch?" {n}Cassia löst sich betreten von dir, und rote Scham legt sich um ihre Schultern wie ein Schal aus einem dünnen Flor. Dann schmilzt er dahin und du wirst aus den Wellen dieser unnatürlichen Kraft entlassen. Du bemerkst den Augenblick nicht einmal, in dem der Schmerz und die Angst verschwinden, und irgendwie bist du überzeugt, dass dieses Gefühl nächstes Mal bei weitem nicht so schwer zu ertragen sein wird. Und dass es definitiv ein nächstes Mal geben wird.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. And that there definitely will be a next time.{/n}

Dann schmilzt er dahin und du wirst aus den Wellen dieser unnatürlichen Kraft entlassen. Du bemerkst den Augenblick nicht einmal, in dem der Schmerz und die Angst verschwinden, und irgendwie bist du überzeugt, dass dieses Gefühl nächstes Mal bei weitem nicht so schwer zu ertragen sein wird. Und dass es definitiv ein nächstes Mal geben wird.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Vous... vous le voyez aussi ? » {n}demande Cassia en s'écartant maladroitement de vous, alors qu'une gêne cramoisie drape ses épaules comme un châle de gaze. Puis elle s'évanouit et vous êtes {mf|libéré|libérée} des ondes de ce pouvoir surnaturel. Vous ne remarquez même pas le moment où la peur et la douleur disparaissent et, d'une certaine manière, vous avez la certitude que cette sensation sera moins difficile à supporter la prochaine fois. Comme vous avez la certitude qu'il y aura une prochaine fois.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. Puis elle s'évanouit et vous êtes {mf|libéré|libérée} des ondes de ce pouvoir surnaturel. Vous ne remarquez même pas le moment où la peur et la douleur disparaissent et, d'une certaine manière, vous avez la certitude que cette sensation sera moins difficile à supporter la prochaine fois. Comme vous avez la certitude qu'il y aura une prochaine fois.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «¿También... lo ve?». {n}Cassia se aparta con torpeza y la vergüenza carmesí cubre sus hombros como un chal. Cuando se desvanece te liberas de las olas de ese poder antinatural. Ni siquiera te das cuenta del momento en el que el dolor y el miedo se desvanecen y, de algún modo, confías en que esta sensación no será tan difícil de soportar la próxima vez, ya que seguramente habrá una próxima vez.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. And that there definitely will be a next time.{/n}

Ni siquiera te das cuenta del momento en el que el dolor y el miedo se desvanecen y, de algún modo, confías en que esta sensación no será tan difícil de soportar la próxima vez, ya que seguramente habrá una próxima vez.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「{name}様にも…見えるのですか？」{n}カシアはぎこちなくあなたから離れる。困惑に赤くなった彼女の肩が、まるでガーゼのショールのように見える。そのショールは溶けて消え、あなたはこの不自然な力のさざ波から解放される。あなたは痛みと恐怖が消えた瞬間にも気付かない。そして今度この感覚に襲われたらほとんど耐えられないだろうことを確信する。そして、間違いなく2回目が来ることも。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time. And that there definitely will be a next time.{/n}

traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Sen de... Görüyor musun?" {n}Cassia, tuhaf bir şekilde kendini geri çekiyor. Kızıl utangaçlık, tülbent bir şal gibi omuzlarını kaplıyor. Ardından renkler kayboluyor, bu doğaüstü gücün dalgalarından kurtuluyorsun. Acı ve korkunun geçtiğinin farkına bile varmıyorsun ancak bir şekilde bu duygulara hükmetmenin gelecekte daha kolay olacağını duyumsuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Do you... see it too?" {n}Cassia awkwardly pulls away from you, and crimson embarrassment drapes her shoulders like a gauze shawl. Then it melts away, and you are released from the ripples of this unnatural power. You do not even notice the moment when the pain and fear vanish, and somehow, you are confident that this sensation will not be nearly as difficult to bear next time.
